text: oh, please. every time the topic of change comes up, you throw zachary quinto in my face. i'm upset the mailman has a new haircut, zachary quinto. i'm upset that daylight saving time started, zachary quinto. i'm upset daylight saving time ended, zachary quinto. i'm saying this for the last time, zachary quinto was a weird, wonderful, unrepeatable event. so stop using him against me.
